items.sentence: You have to keep doing that for another three hours.
You have to study French whether you like it or not.
I don\'t want to get involved in that sort of thing.
I expect that Tom won\'t do what you want him to do.
Have I already told you about the book I\'m writing?
Have you decided when you\'re going to go to Boston?
Tom and Mary couldn\'t pay back the money they owed.
Tom and Mary don\'t want to walk home by themselves.
I can usually tell when someone is hiding something.
The doctor told Tom that he should drink more water.
The girl insisted on going shopping with her mother.
The last thing I want to do is leave you here alone.
Better the devil you know than the devil you don\'t.
Bus drivers aren\'t the only ones who are on strike.
I always pay for dinner whenever we go out together.
I am thinking of getting it translated into English.
I answered your questions. Now let me ask you a few.
I asked Tom if he had a cold, but he shook his head.
I asked around and everybody says Tom is a good guy.
I want to thank you for picking Tom up after school.
